scripts.start: concurrently "cd brokers && npm start" "cd catalog && npm start"  "cd instances && npm start"
scripts.install: concurrently "cd brokers && npm install" "cd catalog && npm install"  "cd instances && npm install"
scripts.ci: cd instances && npm ci --unsafe-perm && cd ../catalog && npm ci --unsafe-perm && cd ../brokers && npm ci --unsafe-perm
scripts.build: concurrently "cd brokers && npm run-script build" "cd catalog && npm run-script build"  "cd instances && npm run-script build"
scripts.lint-check: concurrently "cd brokers && npm run lint-check" "cd catalog && npm run lint-check"  "cd instances && npm run lint-check"
scripts.eslint-check: concurrently "cd brokers && npm run eslint-check" "cd catalog && npm run eslint-check"  "cd instances && npm run eslint-check"
